tags.description: The site of the historic gold-rush town of Lyell, this large, grassed campsite is easily accessible. Explore the gold workings at settlements of Gibbstown (2 hr return), Zalatown and 8 Mile, plus the Alpine Battery site.
tags.name: Lyell Campsite

tags.description:
Restricted Duration Stay: No more than four nights in any single calendar month. 
Restricted Hours of Use: 5.00pm to 9.00am the following morning.
Restricted Months of Use: From 1 November to 30 April in the following year.
tags.name: Maruia Falls Carpark (self contained only)
